ygData.subject: researched scrolls
ygData.msgSnippet: ok i have yet to see someone ask so i will after successfully performing research, i hear you get a scroll that you can scribe in your spellbook, is this one
ygData.messageBody:
ok i have yet to see someone ask so i will
after successfully performing research, i hear you get a scroll
that you can scribe in your spellbook, is this one of those "sticky"
items or can you actually trade them with others, also, are they based on
level, ex can you scribe all the scrolls that you research, or only those
that are your level or below?
